trigger_event: Code commit to a feature branch
success_criteria: >80% unit test coverage; Linting passes; No new 'blocker' or 'critical' SonarQube issues.
failure_action: Block merge to main branch; GitHub status check fails.
business_impact: Prevents basic errors and style violations from entering the main codebase.

trigger_event: Successful PR merge to main branch
success_criteria: Docker build succeeds; Integration tests pass (>95%); No 'critical' or 'high' vulnerabilities found by Snyk/Trivy scan.
failure_action: Fail the build; Block deployment; Alert security and dev lead.
escalation_procedure: Automatic alert to on-call security and DevOps.
business_impact: Prevents vulnerable or broken code from being deployed to any environment.

success_criteria: Smoke test suite passes (100%); Critical path E2E suite passes (>98%); Performance baseline test shows no more than 5% regression on key benchmarks.
failure_action: Block promotion to production; Trigger P2 incident for investigation.
escalation_procedure: Automatic alert to QA Lead and on-call SRE.
business_impact: Final quality check to prevent major production incidents and performance degradation.

success_criteria: QA sign-off received; All automated gates are green; No outstanding P0/P1 bugs for the release; UAT completed by Product Owner.
responsible_team: Release Manager, QA Lead, Product Owner
business_impact: Final business-level decision to ensure release readiness and quality.
